owner.username: Mississippi Department of Archives and History

description._content: Collection: Crowe (Milburn J.) Photograph Album Call number: PI/2005.0015 System ID: 94508. Link to the catalog The Crowe (Milburn J.) album. (top left) indexed as: W. T. Montgomery notes: “W. T.” This photograph is identical to one of Benjamin Thornton Montgomery at the Library of Congress. photographer: H. J. Herrick, Vicksburg, Mississippi (top right) indexed as: I. T. Montgomery notes: “I. T.” Isaiah Thornton Montgomery. photographer: H. J. Herrick, Vicksburg, Mississippi (bottom left) indexed as: Estella Anderson notes: “Estella Anderson.” (Isaiah's daughter?) photographer: H. J. Herrick, Vicksburg, Mississippi (bottom right) indexed as: E. E. Makiell notes: Photograph appears to be William Thornton Montgomery (Isaiah's brother). Please see our profile page for information on ordering. Credit: Courtesy of the Mississippi Department of Archives and History
